option(ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
option(ASSIMP_INSTALL "" OFF)
option(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS "" OFF)
option(ASSIMP_BUILD_ZLIB "" ON)
option(ASSIMP_DOUBLE_PRECISION "" ON)

set(SIMVIEW_BUILD_EXECUTABLES FALSE)
set(SIMVIEW_BUILD_AS_WIN32_APP FALSE)
set(SIMVIEW_COPY_BINARY_TO_BIN_DIR FALSE)
set(SIMVIEW_WITH_VTK FALSE)
set(SIMVIEW_INSTALL FALSE)
set(GLFW_INSTALL FALSE)
set(SKIP_INSTALL_ALL TRUE)
set(SIMVIEW_SHOW_BUILD_CONF_MESSAGE OFF)

add_subdirectory("Simple-Object-Viewer")
